data: Prof. David G. Stroud Prof. David G. Stroud Prof. David G. Stroud Emeritus Professor stroud.2@osu.edu 614-457-6471 Physics Research Building, 2066 Optical Properties of granular media Josephson junction arrays; applications of small Josephson j High-temperature superconductors, especially flux lattice me Ab initio molecular dynamics studies of metals and semicondu Ph. D. in Applied Physics, Harvard University, 1969 M. A. in Applied Physics, Harvard University, 1966 B. A. in Physics, Stanford University, 1964, with Distinction in Physics, Honors in Humanities, and Phi Beta Kappa Fellow, American Physical Society, 1991.
